doctor.info: Dr. M S Alam (Utsha) is a highly qualified and versatile medicine, gastroliver, rheumatology, hormone, and diabetes specialist in Dhaka. He holds an MBBS, dual FCPS in Medicine and Gastroenterology, and multiple advanced certifications including CCD, EDC, and C-CARD from BIRDEM. He is also an EULAR Fellow in Rheumatology and has completed a prestigious fellowship in Gastroenterology from Hyderabad, India. Currently serving as a Senior Consultant in Medicine at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, Dr. Alam is experienced in treating a wide range of conditions such as liver diseases, IBS, ulcers, arthritis, gout, hormonal imbalances, thyroid disorders, diabetes, and autoimmune diseases. His patient-centric approach and multi-disciplinary expertise make him a trusted physician for complex chronic illnesses. He sees patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi, Room 505, from 4:00 PM to 11:00 PM (closed on Mondays). For comprehensive and expert care in Dhaka, Dr. M S Alam (Utsha) is a reliable choice.
